quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Witch and Wardrobe
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, stars, pevensie. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which character is the enemy of the four children in the movie The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe?

options.text: The Terrible Witch of the West

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The White Witch

questions.question: Is Peter the second of the Pevensie children to enter Narnia in the film The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe?
The path in which electricity travels is called an electric circuit.
The lion that the children meet in the end of the movie The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobeis called Aslan.
In the movie The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe Edmund asked if the White Witch had what candy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Turkish Delight

questions.question: Is it true that in the movie The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, Lucy discovered the wardrobe, while the children were playing hide and seek?
The action in the movie The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe begins in 1940 during a German bombing raid of London.
Stars vanish during the day.
What was the colour of Susans eyes in the movie The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe?
Seasons change because the Earth is getting closer and further from the sun.
There are 4 basic conditions needed to produce an echo.
Which of the following characters in the Harry Potter books is a poltergeist?
In the movie The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, Susan is the oldest of the four children.
What is the name of the faun that Lucy meets in The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe?
What are the names of the four children in the story The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter, Susan, Edmund, Lucy

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Harry Potter and Harry
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, kind, grants. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, the half-blood prince tells Harry to do what to his potion?

options.text: Stir clockwise until the potion turns as clear as water
Add a counterclockwise stir after every seventh clockwise stir
Stir counterclockwise until the potion turns as clear as water
Add a clockwise stir after every seventh counterclockwise stir

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Add a clockwise stir after every seventh counterclockwise stir

questions.question: What did Hermione Granger, a character from the Harry Potter series, think about the Firebolt?

options.text: that it was jinxed and was given to Harry by Sirius Black
that it was given to Harry by Dumbledore because he felt bad after Harrys broom was demolished by the Whomping Willow
that it was amazing and wanted to be the first to ride it after Harry
that it was jinxed and was given to Harry by Lucius Malfoy who was still angry about the loss of his House Elf

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: that it was jinxed and was given to Harry by Sirius Black

questions.question: Dumbledore was in contact with Sirius Black in Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.
In what book of the Harry Potter series does professor Trelawney get fired?

options.text: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
She doesnt get fired in the books

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

questions.question: Which of these characters kissed Harry after a lesson of DA in Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix?
What group did Nearly-headless Nick never become a part of in Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Headless Hunt

questions.question: Which of the following characters are described as trustworthy in Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban?

options.text: James Potter, Remus Lupin, Sirius Black
James Potter, Sirius Black, Peter Pettigrew

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: James Potter, Remus Lupin, Sirius Black

questions.question: What kind of creature was Buckbeak from the book Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban?
In which movie did Hermione Granger say the following:

options.text: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
Harry Potter and the Sorcerers Stone

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harry Potter and the Sorcerers Stone

questions.question: In the Harry Potter books, what is the name of Hagrids three-headed dog?
Who was the last person to talk to Harry at the end of Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets?
According to the Harry Potter books, who is Harrys godfather?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sirius Black

questions.question: What is the name of the potion that grants good luck, mentioned in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Felix Felicis

questions.question: In the Harry Potter books, what is Harrys classmate Hermiones full name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hermione Jean Granger

questions.question: According to the Harry Potter books, what is the full name of Dumbledore, the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry?

options.text: He never revealed his full name in the books

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Narnia and Books

questions.question: The Chronicles of Narnia, written by C.S. Lewis, is a series of seven fantasy novels. Which of the following is not one of the books in this series?

options.text: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
The Voyage of the Dawn Treader

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Boy and His Horse

questions.question: What can Bungy the budgie do?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: water ski

questions.question: Stephanie has $0.85. She gives a quarter to Jennifer. In return, Jennifer gives Stephanie a dime. How much money does Stephanie have now?

Luna Lovegood was reading the Quippler on the Hogwarts Express.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arthur Weasley

questions.question: In The Voyage of the Dawn Treader, published in 1952, Edmund and Lucy Pevensie return to Narnia along with their younger cousin named what?

There comes a point when Peter, Susan, Edmund, and Lucy Pevensie are no longer allowed to visit Narnia because they are too old. So the lion calls their young cousin back to Narnia together with Jill, a fellow student of his. This happens in which book of The Chronicles of Narnia series?

options.text: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Silver Chair
